message: Agent supervisor pattern confirmed: `src/main.py` imports supervisor and starts exactly 3 agents.
Streamlit string appears only in local virtualenv packages and comments; not in application source. Recommend purging vendored venvs to avoid false positives.

remediation: Remove `myenv/` and `.venv/` directories from repo workspace
Recreate venv: `python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt`
